title: sarOjAkSa nI
sahitya:
sEvintamu rAramma mana cittamu ranjillagAnu shrIkaNThuni


anupallavi

  kAvalasina kOrkela nosagE shrI kALahastIshuni I kanula karavutira


caraNam    bhaktavarENyula pAlana jESETi shakti galgina shrI sAmbamUrtini 
tyakta kAmakulai tAraka nAmamu raktiga bADucu rAja vadanulAra 
shaktitoDa puravairi mahOtsava sAmrAjya vaigarini jUcina 
bhakti mukti galgu namma shrI gOpAla dAsanutuni mudampalarA
